summary: Gemini, Google’s AI chatbot, had 350 million monthly active users as of March. Google estimates that ChatGPT had roughly 600 million monthly users in March. That puts Gemini on a similar user base to Meta AI, CEO Mark Zuckerberg said in September. Gemini has been integrated with Samsung phones, Google Workspace applications, and Chrome. In the last year, Google has put Gemini in front of millions of users.
